Honeywell Customer Connect
Dear Honeywell Customer, We know your routine is busy! We’d like to bring the following information and articles to your attention, so you don’t miss anything.
If you need additional information, please do not hesitate to contact me. -- David Did You Know?
Technical Video of the Month We're excited to introduce a new segment for the Customer Connect newsletter. Each month, the customer and product support team will bring you the most talked about topics in aviation maintenance from MyAerospace. For July, here are the essential how-to videos for the Terrain Database.
Downloading the Terrain Database <[[http://youtu.be/Gigjb1BIOnQ]]> How to download a Terrain Database to a PCMCIA card.
Loading the Terrain Database <[[http://youtu.be/O93DoYyDHro]]> How to load a Terrain Database into a MK V/MK VII EGPWS.
Visit MyAerospace <[[https://myaerospace.honeywell.com/]]> to access the Technical Knowledge Center's thousands of articles and videos to help you solve technical issues, parts ordering, your order status and much more.
Field Service Engineer Puts HTF7000 Experience on the Line Michael Cox knows the HTF7000 turbofan engine like the back of his hand. He spent more than a dozen years as a member of the HTF7000 engineering team, where he focused on developing and executing programs to improve the performance and reliability of mechanical parts. Read this Field Service Engineer profile. <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/news-listing/2019/july/field-service-engineer-puts-htf7000-experience-on-the-line]]>
Honeywell Operators Discuss Issues with GAMA Exec On June 18th, Paul Feldman, a Vice President at the General Aviation Manufacturers Association (GAMA), was joined by 45 business aircraft operators at the Honeywell Operator Conference in Washington, D.C., for a spirited discussion about key challenges and opportunities facing general aviation. Read Paul Feldman's guest blog article. <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/blogs/2019/july/honeywell-operators-discuss-issues-with-gama-exec]]>
If you weren't able to attend this Operators Conference, click here <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/events-listing/2019/january/2019-operator-conferences]]> to see the upcoming events in 2019.
Brazil Service Center (BSC) Grand Opening Located in São José dos Campos, São Paulo, Brazil the Brazil Service Center (BSC) is scheduled to start supporting Business and General Aviation (BGA) customers next month. With this facility, Honeywell will be offering exchange parts in region (SPEX pool) and repair for Displays, ADIRU, TCAS, Weather Radar, NavCom.
